channel.title: Halo 3 for the computer.
channel.description:
Discuss.
I am highly pissed at Bungie for not having released it by now. Halo 3 is a spectacular game and would be even more amazing with the ability to mod and not having to use a shitty controller.

item.title: Halo 3 for the computer.
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Except its the demo so neither are possible. Why would I own the full game? Its really not worth it. In any case, I just needed to post that because the game was getting annoying for me, and this thread is a convenient place for dumping of anti-Halo sentiment.

No shit, huh?

But yeah. I love Halo, I love Half life. I hate their fans with a passion. In fact, when I get the chance, I’ll be sure they’ll be gagging on their own blood in the streets and looking at each other stupidly and confused.

They will finally know what it’s like to SHARE something mutually, even if it’s pain.

Also, JK isn’t the typical Halo fan, this guy is.

https://www.bungie.net/Forums/posts.aspx?postID=38265660

item.title: Halo 3 for the computer.
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Except its the demo so neither are possible. Why would I own the full game? Its really not worth it. In any case, I just needed to post that because the game was getting annoying for me, and this thread is a convenient place for dumping of anti-Halo sentiment.

I just thought you said your school had it, so I assumed it was the full game (I don’t know why.)
But yeah, Blood Gulch is only good when you remove the Banshees, or if it’s like in Halo 3 where they’re almost useless (unless you “flip your Banshee” that is: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-uVhbzMr_G0)

Acristoff:

You assume I have an anti-halo bias, but I like Halo 3 a lot, certainly not the best game ever but it’s fun to play with some friends. You just made an ass out of yourself… Also you failed to comprehend those little words I added to my sentences such as "most or “large chunk”. Good day.

Show me statistics from a study conducted by a well known and respected group of scientist that shows that a majority/large chunk of Halo fans are retards, or else YOU’RE the ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 for the computer.
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Is that true or is it just your fanboy anti-Halo bias?
I’m a Halo fan, and I write in complete sentences, don’t I?
There are as many 8 year old cunts in Halo as there are in every other popular multiplayer game I’ve played (TF2, CSS, MW2 etc.) Just because it’s on a console doesn’t mean there’s more.

You assume I have an anti-halo bias, but I like Halo 3 a lot, certainly not the best game ever but it’s fun to play with some friends. You just made an ass out of yourself… Also you failed to comprehend those little words I added to my sentences such as "most or “large chunk”. Good day.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3 for the computer.
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Acristoff:

I almost laughed. Not saying all Halo fans are stupid but a large majority can’t even make full sentences.

Is that true or is it just your fanboy anti-Halo bias?
I’m a Halo fan, and I write in complete sentences, don’t I?
There are as many 8 year old cunts in Halo as there are in every other popular multiplayer game I’ve played (TF2, CSS, MW2 etc.) Just because it’s on a console doesn’t mean there’s more.
And even if there were more, you can mute them. BRILLIANT!

Someonerandm:

Can I just throw in here a gripe with Halo: CE? Yes? Good. I play it sometimes at school (There aren’t many actually good games you can get for a mac, and my computer can run none of them), and I have discovered that almost no thought was put into the multiplayer with more than two to four people. essentially, two people get the banshees and then everyone gets spawn camped. What fun. Although it is possible to bring down a banshee with a shotgun (I have gotten quite proficient at this after all the times some one tried to kill me by running into me), its an annoying a broken system. Anytime a major element of the game is declared “noobish” because it allows for way to many kills in unskilled hands, a game is fundamentally broken and needs to be reworked. Anyway, I’ve just been getting really annoyed as of late at Halo, even though I don’t play it much.

Assuming you’re playing LAN, I’m pretty sure you can remove the Banshees by changing the game’s settings.
That, or play on something besides Blood Gulch.

item.title: Halo 3 for the computer.
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
garthbartin:

Ironically (not you in particular) it is the people who dislike halo who are posting moronically in this thread. I hereby quite this thread, thank you trolls, you have entirely ruined this thread with spamming unreasonable hate of halo and telling john to leave when he was actually contributing and you were the ones trolling. (some people actually posted their dislike logically, I’m okay with that) Next time, if you dislike something so much that you can’t be reasonable and explain why, then don’t post! Is is really that hard?

At least everyone here managed to come up with complete sentences. Though I like Halo I was just sitting in the sidelines here not taking sides, and I was being honest when I said a large chunk of Halo fans do lack the ability to form complete sentences.

Read full topic
